entry.title: Bitcoin Core 26.0 release candidate 3 available
entry.summary:
The latest release candidate for Bitcoin Core, version v26.0rc3, is now available for download. Interested parties can obtain the binaries from the provided link to Bitcoin Core's official website. For those looking into the source code, it is accessible under a signed tag on GitHub, ensuring users can verify its authenticity and integrity.
This particular iteration of the software represents an important step toward a new major version release. Users and developers interested in the specifics of what has changed or been introduced can refer to the preliminary release notes hosted on GitHub. These notes offer insight into the modifications and improvements that have been made since the last stable version.
As a standard practice in software development, this release candidate serves as a testbed for the final product. It allows for thorough testing and bug reporting by the user community and developers. If no critical issues are identified during this phase, the current candidate will transition to the official v26.0 release, marking another milestone in the ongoing development of Bitcoin Core.
